Doc: A type for defining the multiple exercise provisions of an American or Bermuda style equity option.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type for defining the multiple exercise provisions of an American or Bermuda style equity option.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.EquityMultipleExercise {
  # When multiple exercise is applicable and this element is present it specifies that the number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date must either be equal to the value of this element or be an integral multiple of it.
  integralMultipleExercise : decimal?

  # When multiple exercise is applicable this element specifies the minimum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date. If this element is not present then the minimum number is deemed to be 1. Its value can be a fractional number as a result of corporate actions.
  minimumNumberOfOptions : decimal

  # When multiple exercise is applicable this element specifies the maximum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date. If this element is not present then the maximum number is deemed to be the same as the number of options. Its value can be a fractional number as a result of corporate actions.
  maximumNumberOfOptions : decimal

}

integralMultipleExercise.Doc: When multiple exercise is applicable and this element is present it specifies that the number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date must either be equal to the value of this element or be an integral multiple of it.
integralMultipleExercise.Name: integralMultipleExercise

minimumNumberOfOptions.Doc: When multiple exercise is applicable this element specifies the minimum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date. If this element is not present then the minimum number is deemed to be 1. Its value can be a fractional number as a result of corporate actions.
minimumNumberOfOptions.Name: minimumNumberOfOptions

maximumNumberOfOptions.Doc: When multiple exercise is applicable this element specifies the maximum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date. If this element is not present then the maximum number is deemed to be the same as the number of options. Its value can be a fractional number as a result of corporate actions.
maximumNumberOfOptions.Name: maximumNumberOfOptions
